price: 30. Markuu u yimid Xaqa waxay yidhaah- deen: Kani (Qur’aanku) waa sixir, innaguna ma aaminsanin.
arabic: وَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ قَالُواْ هَٰذَا سِحۡرٞ وَإِنَّا بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walammā jāahumu al-ḥaqu qālū hādhā siḥ'run wa-innā bihi kāfirūna
